<<<<<<< HEAD
Bracteola Aurea or, Filings of gold drawn from the life and death of that lovely child, Mris. Joanna Reynell who died the 26. of January, 1662. Worthy of observation and imitation. By E.R. esquire. Reynell, Edward, 1612-1663.
[6], 24 p.
printed by Tho. Ratcliffe for Abel Roper at the Sun over against St. Dunstons-Church in Fleet-street, London : 1663.
E.R. = Edward Reynell. Copy trimmed with loss of text; tightly bound. Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
=======

printed by Tho. Ratcliffe for Abel Roper at the Sun over against St. Dunstons-Church in Fleet-street, London : 1663.
